 #include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <string>
#include<sstream>
#include<istream>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,a[1000000],i,p;
        cin >>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin >>a[i];
            
        }
        sort(a,a+n);
        
        n%2==0?p=(n/2)-1:p=n/2;
        
        for(i=0;i<=p;i++)
        {
            if(i>=0&&i<n&&n%2==0)
            {
                cout <<a[n-i-1]<<" ";
                cout<<a[i]<<" ";
            }
            
            if(i>=0&&i<n&&n%2!=0&&i!=p)
            {
                cout <<a[n-i-1]<<" ";
                cout<<a[i]<<" ";
            }
            else if(i>=0&&i<n&&n%2!=0&&i==p)
            {
                cout <<a[n-i-1]<<" ";
                
            }
            
            
           
            
        }cout<<endl;
    }return 0;
}
